tool.name: Tool2

param.name: fc
param.displayname: Point .shp with all raw exposure readings
param.dialogReference: The point shapefile that has the raw exposures (all years of data for all points). Any data from before this year will be excluded and treated as N/A.

param.name: startyr
param.dialogReference: The first year of environmental exposure data that you want included in the analysis. Must be XXXX format. Any data from before this year will be excluded and treated as N/A.

param.name: endyr
param.dialogReference: The final year of environmental exposure data that you want included in the analysis. Must be XXXX format. Any data from after this year will be excluded and treated as N/A.

tool.summary: This tool adds an exposure value column for each case/control, extracting the correct year of exposure data for each row in data table. The data also gets cleaned, eliminating duplicates and any years of data that fall outside of a temporal limit. WARNING: This code permanently changes input .shp
